data.lyric:
[ti:Somebody Like That]
[ar:Tenille Arts]
[al:Somebody Like That]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Somebody Like That - Tenille Arts
[00:11.10]I've seen pick up lines and dive bar strangers slow dance
[00:15.63]I've seen happy hour 2 for ones turn to one night stands
[00:20.20]I've seen neon rebounds
[00:23.96]And late-night drunk dials
[00:29.18]I've seen that Cinderella fairytale go up in cigarette smoke
[00:33.89]I've seen two hearts bet it all and still end up broke
[00:38.90]The real thing won't be easy
[00:42.55]Yeah might take a while
[00:46.89]But I want that all in fallin'
[00:50.47]Keep the fire burning like the first time feeling
[00:54.77]No matter what if I'm gonna love
[00:58.47]I'm gonna love somebody like that
[01:02.62]Kinda heart open arms
[01:04.74]Says forever and will never ever take it back
[01:09.91]If I'm gonna love
[01:12.34]I'm gonna love somebody like that
[01:20.06]I still remember mama walking down
[01:22.37]The living room stairs
[01:24.79]And daddy saying with a smile
[01:26.64]That's my girl right there
[01:28.95]They had their share of ups and downs
[01:31.57]And I saw the best and the worst
[01:34.23]And the work and the worth it
[01:37.24]To get to that that all in fallin'
[01:40.89]Keep the fire burning like the first time feeling
[01:45.10]No matter what if I'm gonna love
[01:48.79]I'm gonna love somebody like that
[01:52.75]Kinda heart open arms
[01:55.01]Says forever and will never ever take it back
[02:00.21]If I'm gonna love
[02:02.53]I'm gonna love somebody like that
[02:15.60]I've had some real close calls
[02:17.97]A couple diamond ring thoughts
[02:20.17]And enough midnight tears to know what love's not
[02:27.36]And I want that all in fallin'
[02:31.03]Keep the fire burning like the first time feeling
[02:35.37]No matter what if I'm gonna love
[02:39.07]I'm gonna love somebody like that
[02:42.99]Kinda heart open arms
[02:45.32]Says forever and will never ever take it back
[02:50.51]If I'm gonna love
[02:52.74]I'm gonna love somebody like that
[02:59.20]Somebody like that
[03:03.00]Mmm somebody like that
[03:07.52]Love somebody like that
data.trans:
[ti:Somebody Like That]
[ar:Tenille Arts]
[al:Somebody Like That]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:11.10]我见识过搭讪的话语 还有廉价酒吧里陌生人的慢舞
[00:15.63]我见过男男女女快乐的两小时 变成了一夜温情
[00:20.20]我见过闪烁的霓虹
[00:23.96]还有深夜醉酒后拨出的电话
[00:29.18]我见过灰姑娘的童话故事 在香烟的烟雾中消失
[00:33.89]我见过两颗心孤注一掷 最后却还是分手
[00:38.90]真实难以面对
[00:42.55]是的 或许需要时间来接受
[00:46.89]但我想要赌上所有 坠入爱河
[00:50.47]让爱火如初生时那样熊熊燃烧
[00:54.77]无论爱你会带给我什么
[00:58.47]我理想的爱人该是如此
[01:02.62]心门敞开
[01:04.74]许诺一生 并且永远不会收回誓言
[01:09.91]如果要爱
[01:12.34]我要爱这样的人
[01:20.06]我还记得妈妈走下
[01:22.37]客厅的楼梯
[01:24.79]爸爸微微笑着说
[01:26.64]那就是我的女儿
[01:28.95]他们共同经历了彼此人生的起落
[01:31.57]我见过最好的 最坏的
[01:34.23]付出努力 也有值得的结果
[01:37.24]为了得到那一切 赌上所有 坠入爱河
[01:40.89]让爱火如初生时那样熊熊燃烧
[01:45.10]无论爱你会带给我什么
[01:48.79]我理想的爱人该是如此
[01:52.75]心门敞开
[01:55.01]许诺一生 并且永远不会收回誓言
[02:00.21]如果要爱
[02:02.53]我要爱这样的人
[02:15.60]我也曾经真的差点修成正果
[02:17.97]有过关于钻戒的幻想
[02:20.17]也在午夜流尽了泪水 明白爱与想象不同
[02:27.36]我想赌上全部 坠入爱河
[02:31.03]让爱火如初生时那样熊熊燃烧
[02:35.37]无论爱你会带给我什么
[02:39.07]我理想的爱人该是如此
[02:42.99]心门敞开
[02:45.32]许诺一生 并且永远不会收回誓言
[02:50.51]如果要爱
[02:52.74]我要爱这样的人
[02:59.20]这样的人
[03:03.00]这样的人
[03:07.52]爱这样的人
